title: The Gary Null Show
content:
The Department of Defense climate change warnings vs. <!--more--> the US government – US’s failed leadership in global warming

Steve Horn is a Research Fellow at DeSmogBlog, which has now become the world’s most accurate source for fact-based information regarding global warming, climate change and as a journalist watchdog on climate change misinformation campaigns.
 It was named by Time Magazine as one of the 25 best blogs of 2011.
 Steve studied law, political science and journalism at the University of Wisconsin, and his investigative reports and writings have appeared on Al Jazeera, the Guardian, The Nation, Truth Out, Alternet, Global Research and other alternative news sites.
 The website is DeSmogBlog.com
